TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Control extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

summary.span: 表示用户界面 (UI) 元素的基类，这些元素使用 来定义其外观。

span.span: Represents the base class for user interface (UI) elements that use a to define their appearance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是许多控件添加到应用程序的基类。The class is the base class for many of the controls you add to an application. 类定义很少行为; 而是可以添加到应用程序，它是更为常见，若要添加的控件继承自，如或。The class defines very little behavior; while it is possible to add a to your application, it is far more common to add a control that inherits from , such as a or . 属性，即，指定的外观。The property, which is a , specifies the appearance of the . 如果你想要更改控件的外观，但保留其功能，则应考虑创建一个新而不是创建一个新类。If you want to change the appearance of a control but retain its functionality, you should consider creating a new instead of creating a new class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式设置和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). 如果你想要创建具有自定义行为的控件，以及允许其他人自定义其外观，控件可以继承类，并定义。If you want to create a control with custom behavior as well as allow others to customize its appearance, your control can inherit from the class and define a . 如果你想要扩展现有控件的行为，可以从类继承继承。If you want to extend the behavior of an existing control, you can inherit from a class that inherits from . 一个不具有都不能显示您的应用程序，并设置以下属性产生任何影响，除非显式引用它们：A that does not have a is not visible in your application, and setting the following properties has no effect unless the references them explicitly: - - - - - - - - - - 若要使用这些属性的常用方法是将绑定中的某个元素到的属性。A common way to use these properties is to bind an element in the to the property. 例如，如果您希望控件来更改颜色的值根据属性，您可以将绑定中的元素的某个属性到。For example, if you want your control to change color according to the value of the property, you can bind some property of an element in the to the . 使用[TemplateBinding 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md)将在控件上的属性绑定到中的某个元素。Use the [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md) to bind properties on a control to an element in the . 重写的元数据属性，并设置其默认值为`true`。 overrides the metadata of the property and sets its default to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)For more information, see [Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)

The size of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的控件排列的第一个可视子级。The default control arrangement arranges only the first visual child. 不应用任何转换。No transforms are applied.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ Background { System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ value); };
member this.Background : System.Windows.Media.Brush with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个用于描述控件背景的画笔。

span.span: Gets or sets a brush that describes the background of a control.

value.span: 用于填充控件背景的画笔。

span.span: The brush that is used to fill the background of the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅适用于控件的休眠状态。The property applies only to the resting state of a control. 控件的默认样式的控件状态发生更改时指定它的外观。The default style of the control specifies its appearance when the state of the control changes. 例如，如果您设置属性上的，仅当未按下或禁用时，该按钮具有此值。For example, if you set the property on a , the button has that value only when it is not pressed or disabled. 如果你想要创建具有更高级的自定义的背景的控件，则必须定义控件的样式。If you want to create a control that has a more advanced customization of the background, you must define the control's style. 此属性才影响其模板使用属性作为参数。This property only affects a control whose template uses the property as a parameter. 其他控件，此属性没有任何影响。On other controls, this property has no impact. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置控件的背景属性。The following example shows how to set the background property of a control. [!code-xaml[ControlProps#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#11)] [!code-csharp[ControlProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示的模板，使触发器被按下时更改按钮的背景。The following example shows a template that enables a trigger to change the background of a button when it is pressed. [!code-xaml[BackgroundProp_snip#ButtonTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BackgroundProp_snip/CS/page1.xaml#buttontemplate)]

summary.span: 在双击或多次单击鼠标按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a mouse button is clicked two or more times.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此路由的事件似乎遵循元素树的浮升路由，但它实际上是直接路由的事件引发沿元素树的每个。Although this routed event seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised along the element tree by each . 如果您设置属性设置为`true`中事件处理程序，后续沿路由的事件将出现设置为`false`。If you set the property to `true` in a event handler, subsequent events along the route will occur with set to `false`. 这是控件的使用者提供想要在用户双击该控件时得到通知并且要处理的应用程序中的事件的更高级别的事件。This is a higher-level event for control consumers who want to be notified when the user double-clicks the control and to handle the event in an application. 想要处理鼠标双击控件作者应使用事件时等于两个。Control authors who want to handle mouse double clicks should use the event when is equal to two. 这将导致状态若要在其中元素树中的其他元素处理事件的情况下正确传播。This will cause the state of to propagate appropriately in the case where another element in the element tree handles the event. 类定义和事件，但不是对应的单击事件。The class defines the and events, but not corresponding single-click events. 若要查看用户是否有一次单击控件，请处理事件 （或其对应的文件夹），并检查是否属性值为 1。To see if the user has clicked the control once, handle the event (or one of its counterparts) and check whether the property value is 1. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将附加到事件处理程序事件。The following example shows how to attach an event handler to the event. [!code-xaml[ControlProps_snip#ControlEvents11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#controlevents11)] 下面的示例显示了事件处理程序事件。The following example shows the event handler of the event. [!code-csharp[ControlProps_snip#ControlEvents1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#controlevents1)] [!code-vb[ControlProps_snip#ControlEvents1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#controlevents1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该控件将引发通过调用事件方法。The control raises the event by calling the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

span.span: The old template.
The new template.

summary.span: 在控件模板发生更改时调用。

span.span: Called whenever the control's template changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改模板的计时如下所示：The timing for changing the template is as follows: 1. 通过更改模板方法调用、 样式触发器或某些其他方式。The template is changed by a method call, a style trigger, or some other means. 2. 属性值发生更改;属性更改回调被调用。The property value changes; the property-changed callback is called. 3. 删除旧的可视化树。The old visual tree is removed. 4. 内部方法调用的最终调用方法。An internal method is called which eventually calls the method. 5. 以后，在度量值，调用并将其附加新的可视化树。Later, during a measure, is called and a new visual tree is attached.

summary.span: 获取或设置控件内部的填充边距。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding inside a control.

value.span: 的内容与其 或 之间的空间量。

span.span: The amount of space between the content of a and its or .

value.span: 默认情况下，所有四个边的宽度为 0。

span.span: The default is a thickness of 0 on all four sides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 填充中左的顺序、 顶部、 右侧和底部指定。Padding is specified in the order Left, Top, Right, and Bottom. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[Alignment、 Margin 和 Padding 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md)。For more information, see and [Alignment, Margins, and Padding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md). 此属性才影响其模板使用属性作为参数。This property only affects a control whose template uses the property as a parameter. 其他控件，此属性没有任何影响。On other controls, this property has no impact. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置控件的填充属性。The following example shows how to set the padding property of a control. [!code-xaml[ControlProps_snip#AdditionalControlProps13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#additionalcontrolprops13)] [!code-csharp[ControlProps_snip#AdditionalControlProps3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#additionalcontrolprops3)] [!code-vb[ControlProps_snip#AdditionalControlProps3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#additionalcontrolprops3)]

summary.span: 在用户单击鼠标按钮两次或更多次时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user clicks the mouse button two or more times.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此路由的事件看上去要遵循元素树的隧道路由，但它实际上是直接路由的事件引发沿元素树的每个。Although this routed event seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised along the element tree by each . 如果您设置属性设置为`true`中事件处理程序，后续沿路由的事件将出现设置为`false`，但事件将出现设置为`true`。If you set the property to `true` in a event handler, subsequent events along the route will occur with set to `false`, but the event will occur with set to `true`. 这是控件的使用者提供想要在用户双击该控件时得到通知并且要处理的应用程序中的事件的更高级别的事件。This is a higher-level event for control consumers who want to be notified when the user double-clicks the control and to handle the event in an application. 想要处理鼠标双击控件作者应使用事件时等于两个。Control authors who want to handle mouse double clicks should use the event when is equal to two. 这将导致状态若要在其中元素树中的其他元素处理事件的情况下正确传播。This will cause the state of to propagate appropriately in the case where another element in the element tree handles the event. 类定义和事件，但不是对应的单击事件。The class defines the and events, but not corresponding single-click events. 若要查看用户是否有一次单击控件，请处理事件 （或其对应的文件夹），并检查是否属性值为 1。To see if the user has clicked the control once, handle the event (or one of its counterparts) and check whether the property value is 1. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将附加事件处理程序事件。The following example shows how to attach an event handler the event. [!code-xaml[ControlProps_snip#ControlEvents12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#controlevents12)] 下面的示例显示了事件处理程序事件。The following example shows the event handler of the event. [!code-csharp[ControlProps_snip#ControlEvents2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#controlevents2)] [!code-vb[ControlProps_snip#ControlEvents2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#controlevents2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值决定在用户使用 Tab 键在控件中导航时元素接收焦点的顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the order in which elements receive focus when the user navigates through controls by using the TAB key.

value.span: 决定设备的逻辑导航顺序的值。

span.span: A value that determines the order of logical navigation for a device.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有较低的选项卡索引的控件接收焦点之前具有较高索引的控件。A control with a lower tab index receives focus before a control with a higher index. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例设置三个按钮的选项卡索引。The following example sets the tab index of three buttons. member this.Template : System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets a control template.

value.span: 用于定义 的外观的模板。

span.span: The template that defines the appearance of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的外观; 如果没有，则不会出现在你的应用程序。The specifies the appearance of a ; if a does not have a , the will not appear in your application. 控件作者定义的默认控件模板，并且应用程序作者可以重写重新定义控件的可视化树。The control author defines the default control template, and the application author can override the to redefine the visual tree of the control. 请参阅[Control 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md)有关如何更改现有控件的可视化树的信息和示例。See [Control Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md) for information and examples of how to change the visual tree of existing controls. 一个旨在作为实现详细信息，看不到外部用户和对象，其中包括一个自包含的单元对象。A is intended to be a self-contained unit of implementation detail that is invisible to outside users and objects, including objects. 操作的控件模板的内容的唯一方法是在同一个控件模板。The only way to manipulate the content of the control template is from within the same control template. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例创建为。The following example creates a for a . 如果您添加到你的应用程序作为资源，应用程序中的所有按钮将显示为省略号，但仍将为按钮的函数。If you add this to your application as a resource, all the buttons in the application will appear as ellipses but will still function as buttons. [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSample_snippet#ButtonCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSample_snippet/CSharp/Window1.xaml#buttonct)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件作者应重写此方法以返回一个字符串，包含控件的使用者感兴趣的信息。Control authors should override this method to return a string that contains information that would be of interest to consumers of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置控件内容的垂直对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the control's content.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了， ，并，可以设置属性设置为，这将拉伸以填充父元素的已分配的布局空间的子元素。In addition to , , and , you can set the property to , which stretches the child element to fill the allocated layout space of the parent element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Alignment、 Margin 和 Padding 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md)。For more information, see [Alignment, Margins, and Padding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md). 此属性才影响其模板使用属性作为参数。This property only affects a control whose template uses the property as a parameter. 其他控件，此属性没有任何影响。On other controls, this property has no impact. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在控件上设置内容的垂直对齐方式属性。The following example shows how to set the vertical content alignment property on a control.
